rules_text: If one or more counters would be put on a permanent you control, you may have that many counters plus one or that many counters minus one put on that permanent instead.
notes:
Hey Herzi, does this go infinite with a sac outlet and a persist creature? Isn’t that kinda Fucked Up in a set with persist?
yeah but also there isn’t a single free sac outlet in the entire set so w/e.
